title: This week in Trump: taxes, travel ban and the federal budget
text: Not to jinx anything here, but the start of President Trump ’s eighth week in office has been remarkably more calm than the start of his previous seven. Now that we’re past the halfway mark of his first 100 days, we all could use a reprieve. Enjoy it while it lasts:
summary:
Not to jinx anything here, but the start of President Trump ’s eighth week in office has been remarkably more calm than the start of his previous seven.
Now that we’re past the halfway mark of his first 100 days, we all could use a reprieve.
